"Lisa":
"Aw... It's over already? I was hoping we
could have a little more fun, but oh well.
What's a girl to do?"

"I suppose there are only so many hostiles.
Once they're dead, that's it. We can't
help it if we're so darn deadly. Hee hee!"

"And isn't it great that you and I can tell
if we're getting in over our heads, and
decide to go somewhere else?"

"It's important to live another day, so you can go out and kill lots and lots of hostiles
the next time."

"That's a really really great thing, okay?
Okay, then, let's head home."
